mapper.select:
select ba.base_area_id as id, ba.area_name as name from base_area ba where
ba.parent_id is null
ba.parent_id = #{parentId}
order by ba.sort
select ba.base_area_id as id, ba.area_name as name from base_area ba where ba.area_code = #{areaCode}

select ba.base_area_id baseAreaId, ba.base_file_server_id baseFileServerId, ba.base_pms_server_id basePmsServerId, ba.area_name areaName, ba.area_code areaCode, ba.sort sort, ba.parent_id parentId, ba.edit_schedule editSchedule, ba.software_upgrade softwareUpgrade, ba.create_school createSchool, ba.area_level areaLevel, ba.area_path areaPath, ba.area_id_path areaIdPath, (select count(*) from base_area nba where nba.parent_id=ba.base_area_id) hasChilder, (select bcal.level_title from base_config_area_level bcal where bcal.area_level=ba.area_level) levelName, (select count(*) from cls_school ncs where ncs.base_area_id=ba.base_area_id) hasDirectlySchool from base_area ba where 1 = 1 and ba.base_area_id= #{id}

select base_area_id baseAreaId, base_file_server_id baseFileServerId, base_pms_server_id basePmsServerId, area_name areaName,area_code areaCode, sort sort, parent_id parentId, edit_schedule editSchedule, software_upgrade softwareUpgrade, create_school createSchool, area_level areaLevel, map_source mapSource, map_output mapOutput from base_area where parent_id is null
select bcal.base_config_area_level_id baseConfigAreaLevelId, bcal.area_level areaLevel, bcal.level_title levelTitle, bcal.mobile_title mobileTitle from base_config_area_level bcal
select base_subject_id as id,subject_name as name from base_subject order by sort

select base_area_id baseAreaId, base_file_server_id baseFileServerId, base_pms_server_id basePmsServerId, area_name areaName,area_code areaCode, sort sort, parent_id parentId, edit_schedule editSchedule, software_upgrade softwareUpgrade, create_school createSchool, area_level areaLevel, map_source mapSource, map_output mapOutput from base_area where base_area_id = #{areaId}

select cs.cls_school_id id, cs.base_area_id parentid, cs.school_name name from cls_school cs where 1=1 and cs.delete_flag ='N' and cs.base_area_id in ( select ba.base_area_id from base_area ba where ba.area_id_path like '%' || #{areaId} || '%' escape '/')

select base_area_id baseAreaId, base_file_server_id baseFileServerId, base_pms_server_id basePmsServerId, area_name areaName,area_code areaCode, sort sort, parent_id parentId, edit_schedule editSchedule, software_upgrade softwareUpgrade, create_school createSchool, area_level areaLevel, map_source mapSource, map_output mapOutput from base_area where base_area_id = #{areaId} and area_level = (select max(area_level) from base_config_area_level)

select case bu.user_type when 'AREA_USR' then area.area_path when 'SCHOOL_USR' then area.area_path || ' ' || sch.school_name when 'TEACHER' then area.area_path || ' ' || sch.school_name || ' ' || bu.realname end from base_user bu left join cls_school sch on sch.cls_school_id = bu.school_id left join base_area area on area.base_area_id = bu.base_area_id
where bu.base_user_id = #{baseUserId}

select * from (select count(1) from sign s left join admin_user a on s.admin_user_id = a.admin_user_id where a.locked != 'Y' --签到 union all select count(1) from project p where p.delete_flag != 'Y' --项目 union all select count(1) from cls_school cs where cs.delete_flag != 'Y' --学校 union all select count(1) from cls_classroom cc --教室 union all select count(1) from supplier s --供应商 union all select count(1) from regional_resource rr --区域资源 union all select count(1) from maintenance_order mo -- 工单 )

select * from ( select count(1) from sign s left join admin_user a on s.admin_user_id = a.admin_user_id where a.locked != 'Y' and s.sign_time between trunc(SYSDATE, 'd') - 6 and trunc(SYSDATE, 'd') --签到 union all select count(1) from project p where p.delete_flag != 'Y' and p.create_time between trunc(SYSDATE, 'd') - 6 and trunc(SYSDATE, 'd') --项目 union all select count(1) from cls_school cs where cs.delete_flag != 'Y' and cs.create_time between trunc(SYSDATE, 'd') - 6 and trunc(SYSDATE, 'd') --学校 union all select count(1) from cls_classroom cc where cc.create_time between trunc(SYSDATE, 'd') - 6 and trunc(SYSDATE, 'd') --教室 union all select count(1) from supplier s where s.create_time between trunc(SYSDATE, 'd') - 6 and trunc(SYSDATE, 'd') --供应商 union all select count(1) from regional_resource rr where rr.create_time between trunc(SYSDATE, 'd') - 6 and trunc(SYSDATE, 'd') --区域资源 union all select count(1) from maintenance_order mo where mo.create_time between trunc(SYSDATE, 'd') - 6 and trunc(SYSDATE, 'd') -- 工单 )
